column4: am trying setup a virtual test enironment for learning ldap .. i intend to run but server and client on a virtual machine but i dont know which is best Virtualbox or vmware server
VirtualBox is free.. you might try that first (Sun's version) and see how far you get with it.
I think you may well be able to migratet the virtual disk between different platforms if you decide to swap.
Note that you'll want Sun's version, which supports 3d acceleration in addition to USB, in 2.1 at least. You'd want to add the virtualbox repository.
